attributes.action: set up a educational Centre for veterans to allow the to re enter the work force
attributes.additional_details:
over 7,000 homeless veterans in the uk alone .

https://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/782860/british-veterans-homeless-sleeping-rough-mental-health
attributes.background:
I am a former army Nco currently studying Psychology in Edinburgh
my main goal is to specialize in PTSD and help war veterans.
At the same me there's over 7,000 homeless veterans all over the U.K  
I am to help this situation and set up welfare projects

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the welfare of veterans, but we're not exactly sure what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we're not sure what services you'd like an educational centre to provide for veterans.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to fund free education and other services to support veterans to re-enter the work force, if that's what you want to happen.
